images.description: Red infrared path in woods - Main Game Background

images.usage: The 'Demogorgon' presence or Game Over overlay texture

motion.transitions: Sharp, instant (0s or 0.1s) to mimic digital switching. No smooth fades.

universal_rules: Ensure text contrast is readable (Red on Black can be tricky, use light red #ff4444 for text).
Do not use gradients for text, only for backgrounds.
All inputs must be controlled components.
Game state must be managed in a parent React context or Zustand store to sync HUD and Phaser.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react' and 'phaser'. 2. Create the 'CRT Overlay' component first and wrap the App in it. 3. Build the 'GameContext' to manage health, score, and game status. 4. Implement the Phaser Game scene with the provided background image. 5. Use the 'Creepster' font for the 'CODE ENIGMA' title. 6. Ensure the 'Question Modal' pauses the Phaser game scene when active.
